description: Generates a sample mapping template that can be used to transform a payload into the structure of a model.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

parameters.name: modelName
parameters.description: The name of the model for which to generate a template.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The Apache Velocity Template Language (VTL) template content used for the template resource.
